titleStmt.title: Here after followeth twoo fruitfull and godly praiers the one in laude and prayse of the trinitie, and the other desiryng grace to with stande the feare of death.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules churcheyarde by Rycharde Lante, and Rycharde Bankes,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Identified as STC 13194a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
